title: 1932년 Bell v. State 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Bell v. State. 판결일: 1932-03-02. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: BELL v. STATE
**판결일**: 1932-03-02
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX

**판사**: Hawkins, Morrow

## 변호인

P. B. Ward, of Cleburne, for appellant., Bloyd W. Davidson, State’s Atty., of Austin, for the State.

## 인용

- 47 S.W.2d 302

## 판결문 요약


HAWKINS, X
Conviction is for transporting intoxicating liquor, punishment being one year in the penitentiary.
The record is before this court without statement of facts or bills of exception. In such condition nothing is presented for review.
The judgment is affirmed.
MORROW, P. J., absent.
...
